product_name: O'Neill Bahia Front Zip Jacket - Women's
long_description: Stay out longer and have more fun in the O'Neill Bahia Front-Zip Wetsuit Top for women. It offers an extra line of defense against unwelcome chills on the water. 1mm neoprene forms to your body for a flexible, comfortable fit; flatseam construction prevents chafing. Zipper offers immediate temperature control; protective internal flap shields your skin from abrasion. Stretchy neoprene under arms and along sides promotes unencumbered motion. Connector at hem can be laced to board shorts to prevent ride up (board shorts not included). Hand wash the O'Neill Bahia Front-Zip Wetsuit Top for women in cold water, drip dry out of sun and store in a cool, dry place.
short_description: Stay out longer and have more fun in the O'Neill Bahia Front-Zip Wetsuit Top for women. It offers an extra line of defense against unwelcome chills on the water.
